3D Design / Animation.title: Character Modeling
3D Design / Animation.description: 3D characters modeling focused on creating detailed,animated and game-ready characters for interactive environments.

3D Design / Animation.title: Game assets modeling
3D Design / Animation.description: Created game assets for 'Press Start' as a 3D modeler with UnitDash during our game dev workshop series at ESTIN.

3D Design / Animation.title: Game assets modeling
3D Design / Animation.description: Created game assets for 'Chronobot: Journey Through History' as a 3D modeler with UnitDash during the GDG Algiers Game Jam, where we secured first place.

3D Design / Animation.title: 3D Animation
3D Design / Animation.description: Contributed as a Unity animator for the game 'Bity' as part of the Fun Activities section during the Chesstin Chess League, hosted by Bytecraft.

UI/ UX Design.title: Baridi Trust
UI/ UX Design.description: Designed the UI for Baridi Trust, an escrow service payment extension, created during the Algérie Post hackathon Innovpost, where we secured first place.

UI/ UX Design.title: Ta’ajeer
UI/ UX Design.description: Designed the UI for Ta’ajeer, an app for housing rental, as a part of my 3rd year project at ESTIN.

UI/ UX Design.title: Sortify
UI/ UX Design.description: Designed the UI for Sortify, a statistics desktop app for recycling companies, during the BrainOn ideathon hosted by School of AI Bejaia, where we secured second place.

UI/ UX Design.title: Earth Scope
UI/ UX Design.description: Designed the UI for EarthScope, an online encyclopedia for natural disasters, as part of a technical interview.

UI/ UX Design.title: Know Your Pet
UI/ UX Design.description: Designed the UI for 'KNOW YOUR PET,' an educational quiz game that helps kids learn fun facts about pets.

UI/ UX Design.title: ESTIN BIB
UI/ UX Design.description: Collaboratively designed the UI for ESTIN Bib, a repository of educational resources for ESTIN, as part of the UI/UX department of the GDSC ESTIN club.

UI/ UX Design.title: UniBeat
UI/ UX Design.description: Designed the UI for UniBeat, a music production and plagiarism analysis application, as part of the first edition of Ideatech, an ideathon hosted by Bytecraft.

Graphic Design.title: Dining Room
Graphic Design.description: Redesigned the menu for Dining Room restaurant as a freelance project, focusing on modernizing the aesthetic and enhancing readability.

Graphic Design.title: Starbucks Msila
Graphic Design.description: Worked as a graphic designer for a local shop named Starbucks M'sila, creating visually appealing designs to enhance branding and customer engagement.

Graphic Design.title: Nexus Cybersecurity Club Design Manager
Graphic Design.description: Design Department Manager for the 2024/2025 season at Nexus Cybersecurity Club, based in ESTIN.
